resources.string: Callback by sound. To switch to the video option, please select \"Upgrade\" from the menu when viewing your overview, or become a student

This journal for your meditation practice is developed based on the guidelines of the C.MI. course*. However it can be used by anyone who to keep track of their practice.\n\nIf you are a C.MI. student press the \"C.MI. Student\" button and enter your activation code. Otherwise press the \"free use\" button to continue.
The authentication key does not match
Take your time to setup and prepare.\n\nOnce you are ready, click on \"start meditation\".
You have not written any journal entries so far.\nStart by tapping \"Add new journal entry \".
As per the C.MI. regulations only a maximum of
mins can be logged. Hence the preparation time has been adjusted accordingly.
mins can be logged. Hence the review time has been adjusted accordingly.
Please give the app external storage permission and try again.

This text will offer the C.MI. student access to the provided guidelines, for meditation, logging and submission. This text will be developed based on the course organiser's directions.

This text offers a general overview of the C.MI. program. The text will be accumulated based on the information provided on the website to those interested, along with maybe some extra information, as detailed by the course organiser.
